#Description of the class used to define a state machine

= State_machine_class =

This method implements a state machine using the [http://www.vincehuston.org/dp/state.html state design pattern].

This class provides a general way of changing the actor's internal state, which is defined in time as a [StateClass state class].

==Methods==

Needed methods are:
 *  `set_state(new_state)`
 *  `update_state(current_time)`
